name: Philipp Koehn
content: Philipp Koehn philipp koehn Professor at The Johns Hopkins University Department of Computer Science Hackerman 227 3400 North Charles Street Baltimore, MD 21218-2608 Fon: 1 410 516-3427 Mail: phi@jhu.edu Wikipedia Google Scholar ACL Fellow, 2024. IAMT Award of Honor, 2015. My work is currently focused on machine translation, but more broadly defined, my interest is to make use of the vast amount of information that is available in digital form. My book on neural machine translation is now available at amazon.com. My previous book on statistical machine translation is also still available at amazon.com. Find out about the Machine Translation Group.
